widgetitem.name: TotalsalesRevenue
widgetitem.caption: TotalsalesRevenue
widgetitem.query: select top 10 CopkchildId,CopkChildName,CoViewName from tadnreportchild where CopkChildLangId like '%DAN%' order by CopkchildId ASC
widgetitem.queryTarget: select targetAmount from TaTargetMaster WITH (NOLOCK) where status=1

widgetitem.name: GuestUserSaleswvat
widgetitem.caption: GuestUserSaleswvat
widgetitem.query: select top 10 CopkchildId,CopkChildName,CoViewName from tadnreportchild where CopkChildLangId like '%ENG%' order by CopkchildId ASC
widgetitem.queryTarget: select targetAmount from TaTargetMaster WITH (NOLOCK) where status=1

widgetitem.name: RegUserSaleswvat
widgetitem.caption: RegUserSaleswvat
widgetitem.query: select top 10 CopkchildId,CopkChildName,CoViewName from tadnreportchild where CopkChildLangId like '%NOR%' order by CopkchildId ASC
